channel.title: Fantura ## Runescape-like game/private server
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2gumxpw.png[/img][b]FanturaScape[/b][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2gumxpw.png[/img]
FanturaScape is an unique 2 dimensional private server currently IN DEVELOPMENT.. The game is still playable though and is developed and updated every day. The server is NOT made in java, it is made in visual basic 6. ##Not revealing any source code##
All graphics are pixelated from scratch.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/rhnafd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/fkcqxl.png[/img]
The game/private server is 2 dimensional with 4-directional walking.
[IMG]http://a3.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/387322_2484054629361_1492488062_31950635_976672501_n.jpg[/img]
I'm just showing my work off and asking you for an opinion :-) What do you think? Is it something you would play(When it is done)
Oh, i forgot to mention, the game is in development, but you can play the game while it BEING DEVELOPED. E.g. you might just walk around killing some goblins when all of a sudden a new house appears.
PM if you want the client comment if you want me to put it directly in the post
##UPDATE LOG## JAN 14 *Added PVP *Added Monsters to train 1-40 on *Added Armour and weapons Shop. *Added all party hats *Added 1-40 Weapons&Arm
JAN 15
*Added FISHING *Added Cooking *Added 5 types of fish: Sardine, Salmon, Tuna, Lobster, Shark Both in Raw&Cooked format. *Added small dungeon with bats and bandits in it (20-25) Boss room empty. *Added WOODCUTTING
JAN 16 Added dragonite metal Added various axes Made tools visible in hand Added woodcutting&fishing animations Added new Robes Added GENERAL STORE & Sell item function Added Metal helmets Put Frostbite tree in-game Added various GFX Added skeletons
JAN 17 *Added 9 Spells INT Now has a purpose *Added about 10 new animations *New sound effects
JAN 18 *WORKED ON GRAPHICS
JAN 19 *ADDED MINING *ADDED SMELTING INTO BARS *ADDED PICKAXES *MADE GRAPHICS FOR NEW NPCS SUCH AS LAVA SLIME, EVIL MAGICIAN, DRAGITH BROTHERS BOSS *MADE NEW BEACH/DESERT GRAPHICS *UPDATED LEARN SPELL ITEM ICON. *MADE BEGINNERS' MANUAL. *MADE PVP DEEPER, ADDED DIAMOND ORE FURTHER IN.
JAN 20
*ADDED ANVIL, YOU CAN NOW SMELT, THEN SMITH EQUIPMENT WITH ANVIL. *ADDED MARKER THAT INDICATES WHERE SKILLING TILES ARE, SO THAT YOU DONT RUN INTO THEM ON PURPOSE AND HAVE TO CLOSE THEM DOWN. *SMITHING COMPLETE *ADDED 3 FLOOR EVIL MAGES' TOWER, LEVEL 30 TRAINING 30-35 *ADDED AL-KAHAARA ENDLESS DESERT *ADDED AL-DESERTA BEACH&TOWN *ADDED BOSS: DRAGITH BROTHERS, DROPPING DRAGONITE SWORD, DRAGONITE SUIT.
-5 skills added so far [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/s5find.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14jp3l1.png[/img] Woodcutting
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2vd5u21.png[/img] Fishing
[size=14pt]WEBSITE FOR PROJECT: [url=http://morot4.webs.com]http://morot4.webs.com[/url][/size]
CREDITS: Robin Perris Made Base Engine GUI
lurviq (Kart) Further Development Graphics GUI
Truxer GUI
*Please give criticism on things, i will not ban you from the game like a 13 year old kid would. *You can say "this game is so shit", i will not ban you. *When criticizing, please specify what you want me to improve.

item.title: Fantura ## Runescape-like game/private server
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I may not be the best graphics artist, but a tip for your design - don’t use inconsistent graphic styles. Don’t use a gradient pattern on the chatbox, Windows-style scrollbar, and then a plain color for the inventory background. It doesn’t look good. I admire the work you put into this and it looks fun (and a bit too much like RuneScape) but if it ends up looking as unappealing as it does now, it probably won’t get a very big fan base.

Read full topic

item.description:
@lurviq wrote:

THIS iS NOT RUNESCAPE CLASSIC, IT IS A NEW RUNESCAPE-INSPIRED GAME MADE FROM A BASE OPEN SOURCE ENGINE.
TIME TO UPDATE THE UPDATE LOG IT HAS ABOUT 10 ACTIVE PLAYERS FOR NOW, MESSAGE FOR CLIENT.

BY RUNESCAPE INSPIRED I MEAN IT HAS NAMES, ITEMS, NPCS, STUFF SIMILAR TO RUNESCAPE.
